name: fibrillary astrocytoma
definition: An astrocytoma that is characterized as a low grade astrocytoma and has_material_basis_in neoplastic astrocytes. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fibrillary_astrocytoma, url:http\://www.braintumour.ca/4877/diffuse-astrocytoma-/-fibrillary-astrocytoma, url:http\://www.cancer.gov/dictionary?CdrID=45602]
